## Packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(lubridate)
library(plotly)

```

## Data Import
```{r}
claims <- read_csv("claims.csv")
claims
```

## Data Cleaning
```{r}
claims_flt <- claims %>%
 filter(STATUS1 %in% "BILLED") %>%
 filter(STATUS2 %in% "BILLED" | is.na(STATUS2)) %>%
 filter(STATUSP %in% 
 "BILLED")

claims_clean <- claims %>%
  filter(DEPARTMENTID >= 6L & DEPARTMENTID <= 20L)

claims_clean2 <- claims %>%
  mutate(SERVICEDATE = year(SERVICEDATE)) %>%
  filter(SERVICEDATE >= "2020-01-01") %>%
  select(PATIENTID, PROVIDERID, DEPARTMENTID, DIAGNOSIS1)
```

## Data Visualization
```{r}
 dv1 <- ggplot(claims_clean) +
 aes(x = DEPARTMENTID) +
 geom_histogram(bins = 30L, fill = "#112446") +
 theme_minimal()

ggplotly(dv1)

```
